English version in below

◎時間：2025年01月09日 – 2025年01月28日

◎地點：日本 東京都立大學

◎費用：150,000 日幣 （不包含餐費、機票、保險、交通費及其他個人花費）

◎報名截止時間：2024.10.18

◎報名流程

1.填寫google 表單向國際處報名，同時繳交以下文件：

Google form：https://forms.gle/WmHWBvNoCszJfmY28

在學證明
家長同意書   (下載範本Form：海外短期交流家長同意書)

2.由國際處進行提名後，再提供申請連結

注意事項：

僅有3個名額。
此課程的程度係為從未學過日文或是日文初階者設計。
國際處僅公告或協助本校學生報名參加簽約校的短期活動或課程，其短期課程是否可抵免本校學分，參加學生需遵照教務處相關規定辦理。若活動日期為本校學期上課期間，學生須依照本校規定自行辦理請假手續。

English version

◎Period： January 9 ~ January 28 , 2025

◎Location：Tokyo Metropolitan University Minami-Osawa Campus, Japan

◎Fee：150,000 JPY（Not included in this fee are meals, airfare, traveler’s insurance, transportation between the University and accommodation, and daily expenses. ）

◎Registration Deadline：2024.10.18

1.Sign up via google form and upload below documents to OIA.

Google form：https://forms.gle/WmHWBvNoCszJfmY28

Student Status Certificate
Parental Consent Letter(Form：Parental Consent Letter)

2. After the nomination by OIA, the application link will be provided.

For further information, please visit their website and check out their brochure.

Please note:

Only THREE quotas avavilable.
The class is for those who have never studies Japanese or for beginners or for who wish to talk about simple things.
If you have any questions, please feel free to ask the OIA Program Manager, Doris Lu : issa@gms.ndhu.edu.tw
The OIA only announces or assists our school’s students in registering for short-term activities or courses offered by contracted schools. Whether credits from these short-term courses can be transferred to our school is subject to the regulations of the Academic Affairs Office, and participating students must comply accordingly. If the activity falls within our school’s academic semester, students must follow our school’s regulations to apply for leave of absence.
